title: Crit my logo (sort of a joke)
content:
This is sort of a joke :D (no offense to anyone)

Crit my logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109014511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bendover_6006.jpg)
author: retoid

comments.content: can you give any background on the company, etc? as far as a blank critique we really can't offer anything unless you give us some background.

If the joke is the allusion to sodomy then maybe you should make his arse more attractive.

I would try moving the hat away from the arm a little to give him some more head space.

His arm looks a bit too thick.

Have you tried some curves on the legs?

Good call Miss Tiffany.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109014511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DubonnetPoster_6213.jpg)
  
Maybe Mr Dover would look good in those shoes.

You need to redraw the crown of his hat to make it symmetrical, the righthand side has a greater radius than the left. Is this for the porn star or is it another joke?

Tim

Thanks for the crit guys, like I mentioned it was a joke, thus being something I made up. I might play with it some more. I like the ideas of the shoes.

timd: His right hand? I only see one hand :D

wormwood: ill try moving the hat further away but I dont want to off balance it to the left to much.

_ill try moving the hat further away but I dont want to off balance it to the left to much_

Try just moving his hat up then and don't move it left at all.

This logo is very different in style to your illustration work on your website.  
I especially like 'Lamphead'.
I laugh a little inside every time I see you post this retoid.
